meanings.definition: Materials used to wrap or protect goods for sale or storage.
meanings.sent1: The packaging for the cookies kept them fresh.
meanings.sent2: I bought a gift with beautiful packaging.
meanings.sent3: The packaging for the fragile vase was like a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the packaging for her kind heart.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of the candy caught my eye.

meanings.definition: The process of designing and producing containers or wrappers for products.
meanings.sent1: The packaging of the new toy involved many steps.
meanings.sent2: The company focused on innovative packaging for their products.
meanings.sent3: The packaging process felt like a fun puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent4: His creativity in packaging ideas was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The packaging design won an award for its uniqueness.

meanings.definition: The act of putting items into containers for transport or storage.
meanings.sent1: The packaging of the books into boxes was tiring.
meanings.sent2: She excelled in efficient packaging of the fragile items.
meanings.sent3: The packaging of the toys into the bin was like a game of Tetris.
meanings.sent4: His quick packaging of the groceries impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The packaging of memories in her mind was meticulous.
